title: I Hate All Of You, Except Rasen, That One's Cool

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attack someone each night. This attack is Powerful is they have a role number greater than 1000, and Unstoppable if they have a role number greater than 1995.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You win with @rasen7721 specifically and they can win with you, no matter what their role is.
- You have a permanent private chat with Rasen.
- Rasen must be in the game for this role to roll, but he can't roll this role.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.
